intension: Create an advertisement poster for a college merchandise store that has been operating since 1991. The design should focus on college and university branded gear, including clothes, backpacks, and bags.
globalcaption: The image features a white shirt with a blue circle on it, placed next to a yellow bag. The shirt and bag are both sitting on a blue surface. The shirt is positioned to the left of the bag, and both items are prominently displayed in the scene.
keywords: college, varsity, fashion, university, apparel, style, collage, wear, clothes, clothing, branded gear, university merchandise, merch, yellow, frame, shirt, t-shirt, bag, backpack, instagram, post, insta, ig

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a yellow background with three blue circles placed on it. The circles are positioned at different locations on the background, with one circle located towards the top left, another in the middle, and the third one towards the bottom right. The arrangement of the circles creates a visually appealing composition

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a white t-shirt and a yellow backpack placed on a blue surface. The backpack is positioned to the left of the t-shirt, and both items are sitting on a blue mat. The t-shirt is folded, while the backpack is open, revealing its contents. The combination of the white shirt and yellow backpack creates a contrasting and visually appealing scene
